Method Detail

getChunkwisePosition

Coordinate3D getChunkwisePosition()
The value of the chunk-wise position ranges from (0,0,0) to (16,128,15). (x,y,z)

Returns:
The position of the block relative to the chunk.

getRegionalPosition

Coordinate3D getRegionalPosition()
The value of the regional position ranges from (0,0,0) to (512,128,512). (x,y,z)

Returns:
The position of the block relative to the region.

getGlobalPosition

Coordinate3D getGlobalPosition()
The value of the global position ranges from (-infinity,0,-infinity) to (+infinity,128,+infinity). (x,y,z)

Returns:
The position of the block relative to the world.

getBlockType

BlockType getBlockType()
Returns:
A BlockType object that contains the block ID and block data

Parameters:
other -
Returns:
A boolean value that represents if the BlockType of each block is identical

isA

boolean isA(BlockType blockType)
Parameters:
blockType - A BlockType object to compair against the current Block
Returns:
A boolean value that represents if the BlockType of the block is identical to the given Blocktype

isSimilar

boolean isSimilar(Block other)
Blocks are similar to another block if their blocktype has matching IDs. This means that orange wool IS similar to blue wool.

Parameters:
other - Another Block object
Returns:
A boolean value that states if the current block's is similar to another block's blocktype

isSimilar

boolean isSimilar(BlockType blocktype)
A block can be similar to a blocktype if its blocktype has matching IDs to the given BlockType

Parameters:
blocktype - The BlockType to compair it to.
Returns:
A boolean value that states if the current block's blocktype is similar to another block
